title: Google | L3 | Banglore (Accepted)
content:
Education: B. Tech CSE from 3rd gen IIT
Years of Experience: 1.9
Prior Experience: SDE-II at a prominent startup
Previous comp: 25 LPA fixed + ~6.25LPA esops 
Date of the Offer: Feb 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L3
Location: Banglore
Salary: 23LPA + ~2L retirals(PF, gratuity etc.)
Relocation: 1.7L (yet to confirm this)
Signing Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: 37.5k$ (38% in first year)
Bonus: 15% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~44LPA

Other details: First offer was 21LPA base + 50 stocks. Asked to increase base, the recruiter reverted back with this revised comp without increasing the overall CTC. I know that this is a lowball, but I'm already serving notice period in my current company and had no solid competing offers, hence accepted the offer. What do you guys think of this offer?

title: NVIDIA FTE | Women Hiring 2024 | System Software Engineer
content:
